updateInstructions: Execute command `/update-model-metadata` when this data becomes stale

capability.name: Capability Analysis
capability.description: Analyzes all Kubernetes cluster resources to understand deployment capabilities and constraints
capability.primaryFunction: Complete cluster resource discovery and capability mapping
successCriteria: Complete resource discovery without missing critical components
Accurate capability mapping for each resource type
Consistent analysis quality across all resources
Reliable completion of full cluster scan

modelRequirements.endurance: Must handle ~100 consecutive AI interactions reliably
modelRequirements.consistency: Maintain quality across 30+ minute evaluation sessions
modelRequirements.reasoning: Deep Kubernetes knowledge for each resource type

pattern.name: Pattern Recognition
pattern.description: Creates organizational deployment patterns through interactive workflow for consistent application deployments
pattern.primaryFunction: Multi-step pattern creation and organizational template generation
successCriteria: Successful completion of multi-step interactive workflow
Accurate trigger expansion from keywords to comprehensive lists
Proper pattern abstraction and template creation
Effective pattern storage and searchability in Vector DB

modelRequirements.workflow: Handle multi-step interactive pattern creation sessions
modelRequirements.expansion: Expand trigger keywords into comprehensive related terms
modelRequirements.abstraction: Convert specific requirements into reusable organizational patterns

policy.name: Policy Compliance
policy.description: Creates and manages organizational compliance policies through trigger expansion and Kyverno policy generation
policy.primaryFunction: Multi-step policy creation with automated Kyverno policy generation
successCriteria: Accurate trigger expansion from policy keywords to comprehensive resource lists
Proper schema-by-schema analysis of all cluster resources
Complete Kyverno ClusterPolicy generation with CEL expressions
Correct resource matching and validation rule creation

modelRequirements.expansion: Expand policy triggers into comprehensive Kubernetes resource categories
modelRequirements.analysis: Perform detailed schema analysis to identify relevant resource fields
modelRequirements.generation: Generate complete, syntactically correct Kyverno policies with CEL validation

recommendation.name: Deployment Recommendations
recommendation.description: AI-powered analysis of user deployment intent and generation of production-ready Kubernetes manifests
recommendation.primaryFunction: Intent clarification and manifest generation with large schema context
successCriteria: Generate relevant, actionable clarification questions from minimal user intent
Create production-ready, deployable Kubernetes YAML manifests
Complete multi-phase workflow within reasonable timeframes
Balance comprehensiveness with practical efficiency

modelRequirements.analysis: Analyze user intent and generate focused clarification questions
modelRequirements.synthesis: Transform user requirements into complete Kubernetes manifests using up to 50 large resource schemas
modelRequirements.context: Handle very large context windows (100K+ tokens) with multiple Kubernetes schema definitions
modelRequirements.efficiency: Process extensive schema context without excessive token usage or timeouts

remediation.name: Issue Remediation
remediation.description: AI-powered troubleshooting that analyzes Kubernetes issues and provides step-by-step remediation guidance
remediation.primaryFunction: Problem diagnosis and solution generation with optional automated execution
successCriteria: Accurate root cause identification from minimal issue descriptions
Comprehensive cluster investigation using kubectl commands and tool calls
Generation of correct, executable remediation commands
Proper risk assessment and validation steps for proposed solutions

modelRequirements.investigation: Systematically explore cluster state using multiple kubectl commands and API calls
modelRequirements.diagnosis: Analyze symptoms, logs, and events to identify root causes with high confidence
modelRequirements.solution: Generate specific, executable kubectl commands with proper risk assessment
modelRequirements.iteration: Handle multi-step investigation workflows with 5-8 iterations of analysis
